name: Judicial review
text:
The applicant and any person who participated in the public comment process may obtain judicial review in state court of the final action on a permit issuance or renewal.  This is in addition to judicial review otherwise available. [L 1992, c 240, pt of §1]
 
         [Section effective July 1, 2015.  For section effective until June 30, 2015, see above.]  The applicant and any person who participated in the public comment process may obtain judicial review in [environmental court] of the final action on a permit issuance or renewal.  This is in addition to judicial review otherwise available. [L 1992, c 240, pt of §1; am L 2014, c 218, §8]
